result.title: Report on Structural and Seismic retrofit techniques and projects
result.description: Report including information and available data on structures’ details, and materials, renovation measures, pre and post usage, etc. based on a selection of 3-5 case studies of on-going or finished renovation projects for each participant country. result.title: Sheets on technical data on the three case studies -ACERRE, Peristeri, Brasov-
result.description: Sheets containing all the necessary input data on the case studies. These data include: the structural and technical data, plan of the site, internal plans, elevations and cross sections of the buildings, etc.; the building program for the buildings in which the proposed system will be implemented, including the spaces in the buildings, climatic and energy parameters in the three different cases to facilitate the cost-optimal design.
